game.name: Unicorn Beauty Salon
game.description: There are no better ways you could reward your good fellow (that was so faithful and hard-working) than offering a day of special treatment at the unicorn salon. You are going through an interesting process where you will provide the necessary treatment for this special pony. In this animal game not only that you will treat the wounds, but you will take care of his fashion look.
